# Kokoro TTS Microservice

Real-time TTS with Kokoro-82M for Brazilian Portuguese.

## Endpoints

- WebSocket: `ws://<endpoint>:8000/ws/tts`
- Health: `http://<endpoint>:8000/health/ready`
- Metrics: `http://<endpoint>:8000/metrics`

## Usage

Connect via WebSocket and send JSON messages:

```json
{"type": "start_session", "session_id": "test", "config": {"voice": "pf_dora"}}
{"type": "send_text", "text": "Ol√°, como vai?"}
{"type": "end_session"}
```
